title: "EQT Infrastructure to divest stake in Fenix Marine Services to CMA"
excerpt: "EQT Infrastructure has agreed to sell its stake in Fenix Marine Services to CMA for $2.3 billion. Fenix Marine Services is a provider of container handling services to shipping lines. EQT is pleased to announce that the EQT Infrastructure III fund (“EQT Infrastructure”) has agreed to sell its stake in Fenix Marine Services (“the Company”) to CMA CGM (“CMA”) for an enterprise value of USD 2."
